channel.title: Zaw Myo Tun
channel.description: Recent content on Zaw Myo Tun

item.title: Myanmar Census 2014: Migration patterns among states and regions
item.description: The latest Myanmar population and household census was conducted in March 2014 by the Ministry of Immigration and Population. It was the first national census since 1983. The aim was to count every person in the country on 29 March 2014 (census night) and to collect demographic, social, and economic data. In this analysis, I looked at migration between states and regions. Myanmar is administratively divided into 7 states, 7 regions, one union territory, 5 self-administered zones, and one self-administered division.

item.title: About me
item.description: I am an epidemiologist from Myanmar and currently based in Singapore. This is my personal blog to share some data analysis work and reflection.
